summary: This bill, the "Repair Expenditures Support Infrastructure, Labor Investment, Energy Needs, and Creates Equity Act of 2025" or "RESILIENCE Act of 2025," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It focuses on reducing adjusted financial statement income for certain deductions related to the repair and maintenance of public utility property. The reduction applies to depreciation deductions and applicable public utility repair and maintenance deductions, as defined in the bill, for property under section 168. The changes apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
